Spring Boot.description: Step by step guide to becoming a Spring Boot developer in 2023

Spring Core.description: Learn more about Spring Core, the heart of the Spring framework, and its features for dependency injection, validation, type conversion, and messaging.

Introduction.name: Introduction
Introduction.description: Learn about the introduction to Spring Boot and how it simplifies the development of production-ready Spring-based applications. Explore various resources to get started with Spring Boot.

options.name: Terminology
options.description: Learn key terminology and concepts related to Spring Core, providing a solid foundation for understanding the Spring Framework. Explore more resources to expand your knowledge of Spring.

options.name: Architecture
options.description: Explore the layered architecture of Spring Boot, understanding how different components interact to build robust applications. Learn more about Spring Boot's architecture with detailed explanations.

options.name: Why Spring
options.description: Discover why Spring Boot is a popular choice for developing Spring-based applications. Explore its key features and advantages, and learn about the differences between Spring and Spring Boot.

resources.name: Spring vs Spring Boot: Know The Difference
A Comparison Between Spring and Spring Boot

options.name: Configuration
options.description: Learn about Spring Core Configuration and how to configure the Spring Framework for your application.

options.name: Dependency Injection
options.description: Learn about Dependency Injection in Spring Boot and how it's managed by the Spring Framework's Inversion of Control (IoC) container.

options.name: Spring IoC
options.description: Learn about Spring's Inversion of Control (IoC) and how it provides a flexible, modular approach to software development. Spring's IoC container manages object creation and configuration.

resources.name: Spring IoC, Spring Bean Example Tutorial
Intro to Inversion of Control with Spring

options.name: Spring AOP
options.description: Learn about Spring's Aspect-Oriented Programming (AOP) and how it allows you to define cross-cutting concerns and apply them to specific join points in your application. Spring AOP makes your code more modular and flexible.

options.name: Spring MVC
options.description: Learn about Spring's Model-View-Controller (MVC) framework for building web applications in Java. Spring MVC separates the application concerns into three components: Model, View, and Controller.

options.name: Spring MVC
options.description: Learn about Spring's Model-View-Controller (MVC) framework for building web applications in Java. Spring MVC separates the application concerns into three components: Model, View, and Controller.

options.name: Spring Bean Scopes
options.description: Learn about the different bean scopes in the Spring Framework and how they affect the lifecycle and visibility of beans within the container. Choosing the right scope is crucial for application behavior and performance.

resources.name: Quick Guide to Spring Bean Scopes

Spring security.description: Explore Spring Security, a robust framework for securing Java-based applications. Learn about its authentication and authorization capabilities for web applications and RESTful services.

resources.name: Spring Security: Authentication and Authorization In-Depth

options.name: Authentication
options.description: Explore authentication in Spring Security, the process of verifying user identities. Learn about various authentication methods, including traditional and modern approaches.

options.name: Authorization
options.description: Explore authorization in Spring Security, which controls user access to specific resources and functionality. Learn about various authorization mechanisms and access control annotations.

resources.name: Spring Security: Authentication and Authorization In-Depth

options.name: OAuth2
options.description: Discover OAuth2 with Spring Security and how it provides support for various grant types and resource protection. Get started with OAuth2 authentication using Spring Security OAuth2 library.

options.name: JWT Authentication
options.description: Explore JWT Authentication with Spring Security and how to use JWT tokens to secure your APIs. Learn to implement JWT-based authentication and authorization.

resources.name: Spring Security with JWT for REST API

Spring Boot.description: Explore the convenience of Spring Boot starters and how they simplify the inclusion of dependencies in your application, reducing the need for boilerplate code and configuration.

Autoconfiguration.description: Learn about the powerful and convenient Spring Boot Autoconfiguration feature that simplifies bean and component configuration based on dependencies and properties, reducing the need for boilerplate code.

Actuators.description: Explore Spring Boot Actuators, a set of production-ready features that help monitor and manage your application. Learn about key features like the Health, Metrics, Info, and Configuration endpoints for application health and performance insights.

resources.name: Building a RESTful Web Service with Spring Boot Actuator

Embedded Server.description: Learn about Spring Boot’s Embedded Server feature that allows you to run a web server directly within your application. Explore the benefits of this feature for web application development, testing, and deployment.

resources.name: What is an Embedded Server? (Spring Boot)

Hibernate.description: Learn about Hibernate, a Java framework that provides object-relational mapping and data querying for relational databases. Explore its features and integration with Spring.

resources.name: Spring Boot - Integrating Hibernate and JPA

options.name: Transactions
options.description: Learn about transactions in Hibernate and the importance of maintaining atomicity and ACID properties. Explore Hibernate's Transaction interface and how it abstracts transaction management.

options.name: Relationships
options.description: Learn about establishing relationships between entities in Hibernate and the advantages of referential integrity. Explore the four types of relationships available in Hibernate and their use cases.

resources.name: Guide to JPA with Hibernate - Relationship Mapping

options.name: Entity Lifecycle
options.description: Explore the lifecycle of entities in Hibernate and the various states an entity object goes through. Understand the significance of transient, persistent, detached, and removed states.

Microservices.description: Explore Spring Microservices, a framework for building and managing microservices-based applications with the Spring Framework.

Spring cloud.description: Learn about Spring Cloud and how it simplifies building cloud-native applications using the Spring Framework. Explore key components and best practices.

options.name: Spring Cloud Gateway
options.description: Learn about Spring Cloud Gateway and how it simplifies building API gateways for microservices using the Spring Framework. Explore key features and best practices.

resources.name: Exploring the New Spring Cloud Gateway

options.name: Cloud Config
options.description: Learn about Spring Cloud Config, a library for managing configuration properties in distributed applications. Discover how it simplifies configuration management and centralizes configuration for multiple applications.

resources.name: Quick Intro to Spring Cloud Configuration

options.name: Circuit Breaker
options.description: Learn about Spring Cloud Circuit Breaker, a library for managing fault tolerance in microservices-based applications using the Circuit Breaker pattern. Discover how it enhances the resilience of distributed systems.

resources.name: Quick Guide to Spring Cloud Circuit Breaker
Spring Cloud - Circuit Breaker using Hystrix
resources.link: Spring Cloud - Circuit Breaker using Hystrix

options.name: Spring Cloud OpenFeign
options.description: Discover Spring Cloud OpenFeign, a library for creating declarative REST clients in Spring applications. Simplify making HTTP requests to microservices or remote services with ease.

resources.name: Simple Implementation of Spring Cloud OpenFeign

options.name: Hystrix
options.description: Discover Spring Cloud Hystrix, a library for managing fault tolerance in microservices-based applications using the Circuit Breaker pattern. Isolate points of access to remote systems, stop cascading failures, and enable resilience.

options.name: Sleuth
options.description: Explore Spring Cloud Sleuth, a library for distributed tracing in Spring-based applications. Understand how distributed tracing can help you track request flows and troubleshoot performance issues.

resources.name: Spring Cloud Sleuth in a Monolith Application

options.name: Eureka
options.description: Discover Spring Cloud Eureka, a library for service discovery in microservices-based architectures. Explore how Eureka simplifies the process of service registration and discovery.

resources.name: Introduction to Spring Cloud Netflix – Eureka

Spring Data.description: Explore Spring Data and its role in simplifying data access in Spring-based applications. Learn about the common interface it provides for various data stores and access technologies.

resources.name: Spring Data - One API To Rule Them All?
What is JPA, Spring Data, and Spring Data JPA

options.name: Spring Data JPA
options.description: Discover how Spring Data JPA simplifies Java Persistence API (JPA) based repositories for Spring applications. Learn about its features for performing CRUD operations, pagination, and dynamic query generation.

options.name: Spring Data MongoDB
options.description: Explore how Spring Data MongoDB integrates with the MongoDB document database, providing a POJO-centric model for interacting with MongoDB data and creating a Repository-style data access layer.

resources.name: Spring Boot Integration with MongoDB Tutorial

options.name: Spring Data JDBC
options.description: Explore Spring Data JDBC, a part of the Spring Data project that simplifies working with relational databases using JDBC while maintaining flexibility and power.

Spring MVC.description: Discover Spring MVC, a web application framework that simplifies building web applications using the Model-View-Controller (MVC) design pattern.

resources.name: Spring MVC Tutorial - Everything You Need To Know

options.name: Servlet
options.description: Explore the role of Spring servlets and the DispatcherServlet in managing requests and the Spring IoC container's lifecycle.

resources.name: DispatcherServlet and web.xml in Spring Boot
What is Dispatcher Servlet in Spring?

options.name: JSP Files
options.description: Explore the role of JSP files in implementing the view component of a Spring MVC application and generating dynamic web pages.

resources.name: Spring MVC: from JSP and Tiles to Thymeleaf

options.name: Architecture
options.description: Explore the architecture of the Spring MVC web application framework and its use of the MVC design pattern.

options.name: Components
options.description: Explore the key components of the Spring MVC framework and their roles in handling web requests and generating responses.

resources.name: Spring Boot vs Spring MVC: How do They Compare?

Testing.description: Explore Spring's testing utilities and annotations for testing Spring applications.

options.name: JPA Test
options.description: Explore JPA testing in Spring and how to ensure the correctness of the persistence layer.

resources.name: Testing JPA Queries with Spring Boot and @DataJpaTest
@DataJpaTest example for Spring Data Repository Unit Test

options.name: Mock MVC
options.description: Learn how to use Spring's MockMvc to test Spring MVC controllers without a web server.

options.name: @SpringBootTest annotation
options.description: Learn how to use the @SpringBootTest annotation to create a fully-configured Spring ApplicationContext for testing.

options.name: @MockBean Annotation
options.description: Learn how to use the @MockBean annotation to create mock implementations of beans in the Spring application context for testing.
